tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE environmental_data (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  area_name STRING,
  air_quality_level INT,
  pollution_level INT
)

CREATE TABLE air_quality_data ( 
  city_id INT, 
  timestamp TIMESTAMP, 
  pollution_level FLOAT, 
  air_quality_index INT 
 )

CREATE TABLE city_info ( 
  city_id INT, 
  city_name VARCHAR(50), 
  region VARCHAR(50) 
 )

CREATE TABLE sensor_data ( 
  sensor_id INT, 
  city_id INT, 
  sensor_type VARCHAR(50), 
  sensor_reading FLOAT 
 )

CREATE TABLE AirQualityData(
  location_id INT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  pollution_level INT,
  pollution_source VARCHAR,
  PRIMARY KEY (location_id, timestamp)
)

CREATE TABLE Location(
  location_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  area_name VARCHAR,
  city_name VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE PollutionSources(
  source_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  source_name VARCHAR,
  source_type VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE WeatherData(
  location_id INT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  temperature FLOAT,
  humidity FLOAT,
  wind_speed FLOAT,
  PRIMARY KEY (location_id, timestamp)
)

CREATE TABLE PollutionLevels(
  location_id INT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  pollution_level INT,
  PRIMARY KEY (location_id, timestamp)
)
